messages.message: i see a bunch of the service dockerfiles have been changed to put almost all `pip install` commands on the same `RUN` command. why is that / should we be trying to stick to that as we add dependencies?

Yes that would be great. Installing all the pips together lets us then uninstall stuff related to pips at the end of that run command. The goal of this is to try to keep all the layers as small as possible by removing all unnecessary deps.
